website_summaries.verdict: Equal parts weird and wonderful, PyroPet candles feature a sweet animal shape that rapidly devolves into a spooky souvenir as it burns.
pros: Creepy aluminum skeleton is revealed as candle burns
cons: No base to catch all of the free-dripping wax

customer_reviews.title: Fun Candle
customer_reviews.text: Candle burned almost exactly as shown in the pictures. There was a little smoke that came off the metal when first exposed, but it quickly went away. No scent to the candle. Been burning about 15 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Keker

customer_reviews.title: Great but pricey!!!
customer_reviews.text: The receiver of this gift and myself both absolutely loved the design and the packaging of this product. I am giving only 4 stars because I feel that this is a bit too pricey. Truthfully, I bought this item after a bit of drinking and while beautiful I think a $20 price range is more fair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was nervous because of reviews...
customer_reviews.text: I was totally nervous to purchase this because of the reviews saying how it didn’t burn correctly etc. I purchased this as a gift for my mom. She LOVED it. She lit it that night and has sent me progression photos. It worked perfectly. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AMicc

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much - it's bigger than I expected; and a really neat/unique gift for my friend. She's going to love it! Almost too cute to light...
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Grady

customer_reviews.title: Really fun to watch it melt
customer_reviews.text: Really fun to watch it melt. I kept it on a paper plate so the wax wouldn't stick on any surfaces, and was left with a big, satisfying pile of wax. The back is the last thing to melt and the metal skeleton becomes stained black with soot, which makes the effect even cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Baker

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift and it is awesome! It is cute as a candle and a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and it is awesome! It is cute as a candle and a piece of art after it melts. It was a fun timelapse opportunity and the quality is strong. I would recommend as a quirky gift for a quirky friend or an interesting discussion piece. It might also be fun to have an unused candle next to one that is burned so that you have a before and after display. Highly recommend and will buy another likely for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! It's a little smaller than I thought it might be, but still a really good size. I bought this as a gift for a friend of mine who likes cats, and she loved it. The box explains the surprise on the inside though, so if you want that part to be a surprise, wrap it in a different box. I did, and she wasn't expecting it at all. According to her it has a good burn time - not super fast, but enough so that you can see the skeleton revealing itself in good time.
customer_reviews.author: LKN

customer_reviews.title: PyroPet Cat Candle!
customer_reviews.text: The candle was even cooler in person. It was a gift so unfortunately I did not see it melt down to the metal skeleton. It was larger than it seemed online, which was also great. Very cool gift and I would recommend to anyone looking for a little surprise inside their candle!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. It smells bad (like a match) while it's burning. I'd like it much more if it wasn't for the odor. Maybe it's a normal smell and the scent of scented candles usually covers it, idk. The box it came in is very nice and the candle itself is pretty cool. At this point I just want to get to the skeleton but I don't want to burn it bc the smell bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: This candle is a great gift idea for anyone who loves cats
customer_reviews.text: This candle is a great gift idea for anyone who loves cats. There are also a few other animals to choose from. It was larger than I expected and I plan on ordering one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small blemish on ear
customer_reviews.text: Just got my black cat candle in the mail, super excited to look at it but one of the ear tips is a little messed up. It’s still really cool looking and the packaging is great but for $35 I want the candle to be almost flawless especially since it’s a gift. It’s a small enough blemish I don’t want to go through the hassle of returning it but definitely a little disappointed in the presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Ann

customer_reviews.title: Really cute candle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday present for one of my kinda goth friends a couple of years ago and she loved it. The outside of the candle is really charming but then you melt it down and you slowly see the Skelton. It's really cool and it kinda a one us only gift but if you like a cat or spooky things its a really great present.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Weston

customer_reviews.title: Got here quick and it's the perfect size. She's going to be excited
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Easter. Got here quick and it's the perfect size. She's going to be excited.
customer_reviews.author: cagenbagen

customer_reviews.title: The candle looks great. The detail in the face is better than ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't burned it yet (so I don't have an opinion about the skeleton). The candle looks great. The detail in the face is better than the images depict. Color is right on. The size is good, a little bigger than I had thought. Will have to get a second one, to burn.
customer_reviews.author: dmbPhotog

customer_reviews.title: Wick is straight
customer_reviews.text: The candle works fine as a candle, but the wick is straight vertical through the cat. Once the face is uncovered, it scorches the metal, if it's not moved. The rest of the skeleton can be a chore to uncover. Cute candle, great gift idea, good product to recommend, but set your expectations a little lower for this.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Kroft

customer_reviews.title: OMG this looks so cool
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Much bigger than I thought, I cannot wait to use it. Get it, it is so worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jaimejamms

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Not as awesome in reality. Product looks great before lot but the metal skeleton is a flimsy piece of material, kind of like a pipe cleaner. Not long lasting (neither candle or skeleton). Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: inboccaallupo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any cat lover!
customer_reviews.text: This candle is absolutely perfect for any cat lover. My girlfriend definitely approved! I recommend to keep it in a cool place that way it won't wax & I also recommend to keep it for decoration don't light it up but over all great product!
customer_reviews.author: ViciousWolf18

customer_reviews.title: So dang cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present and am going to buy more ASAP!!!!! They are just as presented in the picture! So cute and sturdy! The candle wax is the perfect pink. I wasn’t expecting such good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So excited for thai candle. I’ve been wanting it for awhile and the price was initially a deterrent. This candle is huge and worth it! Will be buying more and sending as gifts to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Tribble

customer_reviews.title: Fun Candle!
customer_reviews.text: This was really fun to melt at Halloween. This candle-with-skeleton is really unique, and I definitely recommend it to crazy cat people and people who just plan like candles. :-)
customer_reviews.author: ejr

customer_reviews.title: This is so cool. It burns for a while before the skeleton ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool. It burns for a while before the skeleton inside starts to show. I got it for my friend and she absolutely loved it. Additionally, it's a lot bigger than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: It is a good size - not super tiny. And very neat looking. Haven't burned it yet but I expect it will be amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for twisted cat people
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. I bought the gray candle. The cat is adorable. It's a gift so I haven't seen the inside but the idea is so cool.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: The purple is a nice color. The candle it self is really cute. Was a gift and the receiver loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured! I got this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend who loves cats but also likes creepy things and it was PERFECT! A little expensive but it’s a lot bigger than I realized so I think it was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: Totally Giftable!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this candle! Functional and dark... Lol Perfect gift for those that would appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: MaddyCat

customer_reviews.title: This candle is GORGEOUS!
customer_reviews.text: This candle is GORGEOUS! I had been wanting one of these since I saw the Kickstarter years ago and now I finally have one of my very own!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, a little messy, but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I've had this candle since January of this year and I love it. It was well made and a beautiful wax sculpture out of the box, and an even cooler one as the metal frame is revealed. I still have yet to burn through all of it, but I think it looks wonderful with the frame being only slightly revealed through the dripping wax. P.S. make sure you are ready to clean the wax
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a cat lover
customer_reviews.text: a little macabre, but a great gift for any cat lover. small and would look great on any desk.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Alfieri

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas and it was possibly one of her favorite gifts!!! Although the candles are unscented so it does not put off an odor. Slow burning as well so I lasts a while! I will probably venture out and get her a different animal next time, maybe the unicorn!
customer_reviews.author: James Reaves

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should experience this!
customer_reviews.text: It was super sad to melt this cute candle but amazingly entertaining to watch! The shadows it casts are scary and fun and the quality of the candle and inner skeleton is impressive!
customer_reviews.author: C Marie

customer_reviews.title: Unique Candle
customer_reviews.text: Really fun candle. Almost hated to burn it, but I loved the little skeleton inside. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift or decor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and I have to say I was surprised at the size of it when I received it. It was bigger than I thought it’d be. I loved the purple color and it came in tact! The recipient has not burned it yet as they’re just using it for decoration, but it’s very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces and nephew loved these candles. They were part of their Christmas gift. They were so excited to burn them to see the skeleton.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hilts

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for cat lover. She loved it. Heavy and huge.
customer_reviews.author: mike martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf thing.  Not so much for burning.
customer_reviews.text: Great conversation piece. It is not really a great candle.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Very cool candle. The perfect gift for my friend who loves black cats and all things creepy :]. I was surprised how great quality it was.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great candle
customer_reviews.text: The item was a great gift for the holidays. It was a nice, solid candle that is actually a little heavy and looks just like the picture. It is also a decent size, it seems too nice to burn.
customer_reviews.author: Rbunny22

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! I've been looking at them for a while now, and finally decided to get one. And I'm so glad I did. Its beautiful, and I love seeing the skeleton emerging as it burns down.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend and she loved it so much she doesn’t want to burn it but is excited to see the skeleton inside.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I waited to purchase this until it went down in price to give as a gift. She squealed with delight as she realized what it turns into. So fun....now I want one!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for a friend of mine and it looked awesome!!! Totaly recomend buying one!
customer_reviews.author: K_5678

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister and she loved it so much I ended up buying her a second so she could burn one and keep one for decoration. Gorgeous design and bigger than expected!
customer_reviews.author: ae102

customer_reviews.title: This thing is hilarious and lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother in law and he thinks its hilarious. When burning it actually lasted a long time! He had to keep lighting it to get to the skeleton peeking through!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Great candle!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my neighbors! The candle was a much higher quality than I expected. The packaging/unboxing experience was really nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: charlee harris

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Design!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my sister, and it was perfect! The color and design were both wonderful, and I would absolutely buy another in the future. My only wish is that it was scented, but I understand that it appeals more widely as unscented. Regardless, it's an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift giving!
customer_reviews.text: This candle was a gift & it was a huge hit!! She loved the uniqueness & was excited to start melting it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Cool and fun
customer_reviews.text: Looks really cools as it melts. Best used on level surface.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles! I had to buy more to give as gifts, which were a big hit. I will likely buy more. It's just a very cool looking candle
customer_reviews.author: S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Unscented candle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it wasn’t a hit. They really disliked that is was unscented. I’m not sure why you would even want a unscented candle for.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Green

customer_reviews.title: Daughter love these.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one different animal I bought my daughter, she live these candles.
customer_reviews.author: Faye marceau

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend. She had wanted one for a while. She loved it and burned it right away. I wish it would have lasted a little longer though. Make sure you put it on something for all the wax.
customer_reviews.author: david jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great wick a bit crooked t
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how this burned though it did burn a bit crooked but it didn't matter I moved how you would see the skeleton start showing and the burn marks are easy to clean I even got a purple one just to keep on my bedside table
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase, I gave it as a Christmas gift. And she loved it. Everybody thought it was a really cool candle. I was also surprised on how big it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermina ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Got it for her, she won’t even light it.
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend said it’s so cute..it now just sits on the shelf and she refuses to let me light it lol strongly recommend for cat lovers
customer_reviews.author: phillip

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It burns for a while and the candle is bigger than expected. Haven't seen the skeleton yet but I bet its cool.
customer_reviews.author: OwO

customer_reviews.title: Unique Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool candle. My 13-year old daughter loves it. Great gift! Pricy, but the candle seems to last a long time and is quite unique.
customer_reviews.author: asmpdx

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a xmas gift, it was so cute my friend didn't want to burn it! So unique to upgrade the typical candle gifting experience

customer_reviews.title: I think she'll like it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a special request for Christmas, I think she'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty K

customer_reviews.title: It’s adorable!
customer_reviews.text: The part I most liked was the fact that it melted evenly! They couldve scented it! I get it’s easier to mass produce a non scented candle but a scent would’ve been awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Check Your Order If a Gift
customer_reviews.text: Sent wrong color, chipped ear. This was for a birthday gift; luckily, recipient still found it cute. It was a lot larger than I thought, so that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: Working out great as a fan-funky-tasting gift! Will update as it burns.
customer_reviews.author: James Monroe

customer_reviews.title: read the description
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the description better. It is a great candle but the skeleton that we were thinking we were getting to keep after was far from wonderful. when they say aluminum they mean pop can thin aluminum. very flimsy. kind of disappointed. great concept though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have one already and purchased this beauty as a gift. These are the purrfect present for any morbid cat lover 😻
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: An amazing gift
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun gift to give! The candle is so unique and beautiful. Looks even cooler when it is melted!
customer_reviews.author: ZJ

customer_reviews.title: She loved watching it melt
customer_reviews.text: The candle was a gift for my daughter. She loved watching it melt. There have been some very annoying aspects of the thing though. To begin with, the wick slid out when the candle still had more than 25% more to melt, making the wax rock hard so the metal "skeleton" is stuck in the remaining wax and it's impossible to get it free without breaking or otherwise damaging it. Next, the candle had no odor, made a huge mess and for the price of this item, I expected a LOT more.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for any cat lover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for an avid cat lover. It was the best gift! Creative, unique, and beautiful gift that changes with time and continues to give.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: broken in transit
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews that mentioned this broke in transit -- but I wanted to order it because it was the perfect gift for my friend. Unfortunately the reviews were correct. Not good quality for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Cady

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY😻

product_meta.title: PyroPet Candles Kisa Candle (Black)
feature_bullets: A cute cat shaped candle reveals the wild beast inside her, a grinning metallic skeleton with fire blazing in her eyes.
Each candle has a burning time of approximately 20 hours.
This is a large candle with dimensions of 6.7 x 2.9 x 4.5 inches.
Made from paraffin wax, cotton wick and aluminum.
Kisa is certified to meet US and EU candle safety standards.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars752 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
